name: YAZZ
description:
I have been developing this  game for a year as my university honours project.

Project Yazz explores player creativity through music and painting. You can use a fully functioning recording studio, paint, watch your creations in the cinema, climb skyscrapers and everything in-between.

*PLEASE NOTE* currently the project is a demo and only supports *XBOX CONTROLLER* (as far as I know), but in the near future I will implement keyboard and mouse support.


Another thing to note is that you can skip the tutorial by pressing L on the keyboard if you want to replay:)

Enjoy my world, I put a lot of effort into this! I would love to hear what you think in the comments down below!
